YagoMod:BloodRitual.NAME: Blood Ritual
YagoMod:BloodRitual.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, NL gains !M! damage when drawn or discarded. NL Exhaust.

YagoMod:Omnipotence.NAME: Omnipotence
YagoMod:Omnipotence.DESCRIPTION: Chose a color to yagomod:Discover a card from.
YagoMod:Omnipotence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Chose a color to yagomod:Discover a card from. NL It costs 1 less this turn.

YagoMod:Defect.NAME: Defect
YagoMod:Defect.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: yagomod:Discover [#ADD8E6]BLUE[] cards. NL It costs 1 less this turn.

YagoMod:Watcher.NAME: Watcher
YagoMod:Watcher.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: yagomod:Discover [#B24BF3]PURPLE[] cards. NL It costs 1 less this turn.

YagoMod:Silent.NAME: Silent
YagoMod:Silent.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: yagomod:Discover [#00FF00]GREEN[] cards. NL It costs 1 less this turn.

YagoMod:Ironclad.NAME: Ironclad
YagoMod:Ironclad.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: yagomod:Discover [#FF0000]RED[] cards. NL It costs 1 less this turn.

YagoMod:RainOfTerror.NAME: Rain Of Terror
YagoMod:RainOfTerror.DESCRIPTION: Choose One: randomly spread !M! Vulnerable or !M! Weak between enemies.

YagoMod:HolyWater.NAME: Holy Water
YagoMod:HolyWater.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a skill this turn heal 1.

YagoMod:LostScripture.NAME: Lost Scripture
YagoMod:LostScripture.DESCRIPTION: At the start of the turn yagomod:Discover cards from a different color. NL It costs 1 less this turn.
YagoMod:LostScripture.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of the turn yagomod:Discover cards from a different color. NL It costs 1 less this turn. NL Innate.

YagoMod:IndomitableSpirit.NAME: Indomitable Spirit
YagoMod:IndomitableSpirit.DESCRIPTION: At the start of the turn remove all debuffs.

YagoMod:SacredKnowledge.NAME: Sacred Knowledge
YagoMod:SacredKnowledge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target dies play the top card of your draw pile.

YagoMod:BloodyBlade.NAME: Bloody Blade
YagoMod:BloodyBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, NL plus damage equal to the damage you took this combat ( !M! ).
YagoMod:BloodyBlade.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, NL plus damage equal to twice the damage you took this combat ( !M! ).

YagoMod:OrdainedSword.NAME: Ordained Sword
YagoMod:OrdainedSword.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL yagomod:Lifesteal if below 30% HP.

YagoMod:Hellfire.NAME: Hellfire
YagoMod:Hellfire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Discard 1 card.

YagoMod:HallowedDagger.NAME: Hallowed Dagger
YagoMod:HallowedDagger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 2 times. NL yagomod:Lifesteal if you took damage this turn.

YagoMod:CallousBeating.NAME: Callous Beating
YagoMod:CallousBeating.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 2 times. NL Shuffle a Gash into your discard pile.

YagoMod:Indoctrinate.NAME: Indoctrinate
YagoMod:Indoctrinate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain that much block next turn.

YagoMod:LastStand.NAME: Last Stand
YagoMod:LastStand.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M!. NL At the start of the next turn lose !M! HP.

YagoMod:BloodGem.NAME: Blood Gem
YagoMod:BloodGem.DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 card, NL lose 3 HP, NL gain 1 [E] energy.
YagoMod:BloodGem.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 card, NL lose 3 HP, NL gain 1 [E] energy. NL Draw 1 card.

YagoMod:Accusation.NAME: Accusation
YagoMod:Accusation.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put a card from your hand onto the top of your draw pile.

YagoMod:LostLibrary.NAME: Lost Library
YagoMod:LostLibrary.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to your hand size.
YagoMod:LostLibrary.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to your hand size + 3

YagoMod:DesecratingBlow.NAME: Desecrating Blow
YagoMod:DesecratingBlow.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Increase damage taken by 2.

YagoMod:FairyBrew.NAME: Fairy Brew
YagoMod:FairyBrew.DESCRIPTION: Obtain a Fairy in a Bottle Potion. NL Reduce the cost of this card by 1 when discarded. NL Exhaust.

YagoMod:PunishmentsSolace.NAME: Punishments Solace
YagoMod:PunishmentsSolace.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you take damage return this from your discard pile to your Hand.

YagoMod:SinnersBlood.NAME: Sinner's Blood
YagoMod:SinnersBlood.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Damage increases with damage taken this turn.

YagoMod:ThreeTenets.NAME: Three Tenets
YagoMod:ThreeTenets.DESCRIPTION: yagomod:Discover. NL If the previous card was attack shows [#FF0000]RED[], NL power shows [#ADD8E6]BLUE[], NL skill shows [#00FF00]GREEN[].
YagoMod:ThreeTenets.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: yagomod:Discover. NL If the previous card was attack shows [#FF0000]RED[], NL power shows [#ADD8E6]BLUE[], NL skill shows [#00FF00]GREEN[], NL It costs 0 this turn.

YagoMod:NoCreed.NAME: No Creed
YagoMod:NoCreed.DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 card. NL yagomod:Discover cards of the same type, it cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
YagoMod:NoCreed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 card. NL yagomod:Discover cards of the same type, it cost 0 this turn. NL Innate. NL Exhaust.

YagoMod:Gash.NAME: Gash
YagoMod:Gash.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn lose 2 HP. NL Ethereal.

YagoMod:Wrath.NAME: Wrath
YagoMod:Wrath.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Can only be played if you took damage this turn.

YagoMod:Repent.NAME: Repent
YagoMod:Repent.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Remove all Debuffs.

YagoMod:ScarredSkin.NAME: Scarred Skin
YagoMod:ScarredSkin.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the damage you received this turn.
YagoMod:ScarredSkin.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to double the damage you received this turn.

YagoMod:Devotion.NAME: Devotion
YagoMod:Devotion.DESCRIPTION: Discard up to !M! cards from hand. NL Heal 1 for each card discarded this way.

YagoMod:SelfReflection.NAME: Self Reflection
YagoMod:SelfReflection.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Add a copy of it to your hand.
YagoMod:SelfReflection.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 cards. NL Add copies of them to your hand.

YagoMod:MartyrFlesh.NAME: Martyr
YagoMod:MartyrFlesh.DESCRIPTION: Apply 2 Vulnerable to ALL characters. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.
YagoMod:MartyrFlesh.FLAVOR: Will you die for the cause?

YagoMod:DivineForm.NAME: Divine Form
YagoMod:DivineForm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible. NL Lose 4 Max HP.

YagoMod:SoulBeam.NAME: Soul Beam
YagoMod:SoulBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Lose !M! Max HP.

YagoMod:Inferno.NAME: Inferno
YagoMod:Inferno.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is discarded, deal !D! damage to all enemies. Increase the damage of ALL Inferno cards by !M! this combat.

YagoMod:DesperatePrayer.NAME: Desperate Prayer
YagoMod:DesperatePrayer.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL Heal for its cost.

YagoMod:EmbraceThorns.NAME: Embrace Thorns
YagoMod:EmbraceThorns.DESCRIPTION: Lose 2 HP. NL Whenever you are attacked, deal !M! damage back.
YagoMod:EmbraceThorns.FLAVOR: It's a real thorn on my side.

YagoMod:ToxicChemicals.NAME: Toxic Chemicals
YagoMod:ToxicChemicals.DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 card. NL Obtain a common potion.

YagoMod:VampiricInstinct.NAME: Vampiric Instinct
YagoMod:VampiricInstinct.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! Bite into your discard pile. Lose 3 HP. NL Exhaust.

YagoMod:Oblation.NAME: Oblation
YagoMod:Oblation.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, heal !M! and draw 1 card.

YagoMod:Dusk.NAME: Dusk
YagoMod:Dusk.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] equal to your hand size. NL Exhaust.
YagoMod:Dusk.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] equal to your hand size + 1. NL Exhaust.

YagoMod:Penance.NAME: Penance
YagoMod:Penance.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you heal, NL Draw a card.

YagoMod:FlagellantParade.NAME: Flagellant Parade
YagoMod:FlagellantParade.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP from a card, deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

YagoMod:BloodAlchemy.NAME: Blood Alchemy
YagoMod:BloodAlchemy.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, lose !M! HP and gain a random potion.

YagoMod:SacrificialStab.NAME: Sacrificial Stab
YagoMod:SacrificialStab.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, Gain !M! [E].

YagoMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
YagoMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

YagoMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
YagoMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
YagoMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

YagoMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
YagoMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

YagoMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
YagoMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and poison to an enemy.
